## WorkerLoader.startWorkerImmediately() method

Start worker, loading it immediately from `scriptUrl`<!-- -->. Waits (using \[\[waitWorkerInitialized\]\]) for successful worker start.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static startWorkerImmediately(scriptUrl: string, timeout: number): Promise<Worker>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scriptUrl | string | web worker script URL |
|  timeout | number |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Worker&gt;
